entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 25 February 2023
